bool FT::TICCheckpoint::do_notify ( Util::Event &  evt  )  [virtual]

Call when the event occurs

Parameters:
evt [in] the event that generates the call to notify
Returns:
true if the event evt should be re-inserted in the list of events
false if the event should not be re-inserted
